quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to lift the non-euclidean latchkey from the floor of the bedroom. After that, unlock the non-euclidean box inside the bedroom. And then, open the non-euclidean box. Then, take the latchkey from the non-euclidean box in the bedroom. After getting the latchkey, unlock the gateway with the latchkey. Once you have unlocked the gateway, ensure that the gateway is open. After that, attempt to move east. With that accomplished, lift the key from the floor of the cellar. Then, go west. Then, Place the key into the safe to lock it. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: unlock non-euclidean box with non-euclidean latchkey
unlock non-euclidean box with non-euclidean latchkey

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedroom. An usual one. Let's see what's in here.

 You make out a safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a non-euclidean box.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The non-euclidean box contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Hey, want to see a mantelpiece? Look over there, a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the mantelpiece.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_12 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the playroom. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



 There is [if d_12 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden hatch leading north. There is [if d_11 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone portal leading west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a cellar. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the dish-pit.



 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a shower, cool, but is it ordinary? You better believe it is.

 You can see a rack. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the rack.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]The rack appears to be empty.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a laundry place.

 You can make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the counter.[end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] birch gateway leading north. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a closet.

 [if c_2 is locked]A locked[else if c_2 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] non-euclidean locker is in the corner.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The non-euclidean locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The non-euclidean locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] birch gateway leading south. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] balsam gateway leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You are in a salon. An usual kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] balsam gateway leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar gate leading west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. A normal kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar gate leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. An usual kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You make out a locker.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a launderette.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. A normal kind of place.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone door leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You're now in the studio.



 There is [if d_11 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone portal leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a washroom.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a TextWorld limited edition safe.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The TextWorld limited edition safe contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The TextWorld limited edition safe is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut door leading west. There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. A normal kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] walnut door leading east. There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden hatch leading south.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You have come into the most usual of all possible vaults.

 Look over there! a toolbox.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_5]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] The shelf appears to be empty.[end if] You make out a table. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the table. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a lounge. A normal kind of place.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a type H box.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The type H box contains [a list of things in the c_6]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The type H box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone door leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in a cubicle.

 You can see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk close by.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] What a letdown! The trunk is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the recreation zone. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

walkthrough: unlock non-euclidean box with non-euclidean latchkey

objective: You are now playing a life changing game of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, recover the non-euclidean latchkey from the floor of the bedroom. And then, make absolutely sure that the non-euclidean box is unlocked. After unlocking the non-euclidean box, open the non-euclidean box. After that, take the latchkey from the non-euclidean box. After that, insert the latchkey into the gateway within the bedroom's lock to unlock it. After that, open the gateway. After that, move east. With that done, lift the key from the floor of the cellar. After that, make an effort to head west. Next, lock the safe in the bedroom with the key. Alright, thanks!
